password_hint_msg: Password should not use on any other site.
password_hint_detail_1: The password must have at least 8 characters.
password_hint_detail_2: The password must contain at least 1 special character, such as &, %, TM, or E.
password_hint_detail_3: The password must contain at least 3 different kinds of characters, such as uppercase letters, lowercase letter, numeric digits, and punctuation marks.
password_suggestion_msg: Your new password must be different from your previous password.
